# searchBarPlacementBarButtonItem

**Instance Property**

An item you use to control the placement of the search bar in a toolbar on iPhone.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var searchBarPlacementBarButtonItem: UIBarButtonItem { get }
```

## Overview

When [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/searchBarPlacement-swift.property] is `.integrated` or `.integratedButton` and a search controller is present, use this bar button item in the view controller’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/toolbarItems] to control the placement of the search bar among them when the search bar is appearing in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolbar] on iPhone. Without this bar button item, the positioning for the search bar defaults to trailingmost for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolbar] case.

The system ignores this bar button item during toolbar layout if [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/searchController] is `nil`. [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItemGroup] throws an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/invalidArgumentException] when you include this bar button item in its initialization. [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem] throws an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/invalidArgumentException] when you include this bar button item in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/leftBarButtonItems] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/rightBarButtonItems].

## Integrating search into your interface

- **searchController**: The search controller to integrate into your navigation interface.
- **hidesSearchBarWhenScrolling**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app hides the integrated search bar when scrolling any underlying content.
- **searchBarPlacement**: The placement of the search bar in the navigation bar.
- **preferredSearchBarPlacement**: The preferred placement of the search bar in the navigation bar.
- **UINavigationItem.SearchBarPlacement**: Constants that determine where the search bar appears in the navigation bar.
- **searchBarPlacementAllowsExternalIntegration**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an alternate object may integrate the search bar somewhere other than the navigation bar or toolbar.
- **searchBarPlacementAllowsToolbarIntegration**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system can place the search bar among other toolbar items on iPhone.
